item.title: A visual MRI atrophy rating scale for the amyotrophic lateral sclerosis-frontotemporal dementia continuum

A visual MRI atrophy rating scale for the amyotrophic lateral sclerosis-frontotemporal dementia continuum. Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis and Frontotemporal Degeneration, 15(3-4), 226-234. doi:10.3109/21678421.2014.880180
